mapper.select: select flag from role where id in (select rid from user_role where uid in (select id from user where uname=#{uname}))
select flag from permission where id in (select pid from role_permission where rid in (select rid from user_role where uid in (select id from user where uname=#{uname})))

SELECT p.flag,p.grade,p.icon,p.id,p.permission,p.pid,p.url from role r LEFT JOIN role_permission rp on r.id=rp.rid LEFT JOIN permission p on p.id=rp.pid LEFT JOIN user_role ur on r.id=ur.rid LEFT JOIN user u ON u.id=ur.uid WHERE u.uname=#{uname}
mapper.update: update user set state=#{state} where id=#{id}
